casebody.data:
Henry MONTGOMERY, petitioner,
v.
LOUISIANA. No. 14-280. Supreme Court of the United States March 23, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Louisiana granted. In additon to question presented by petition, parties are directed to brief and argue the following question: "Do we have jurisdiction to decide whether the Supreme Court of Louisiana correctly refused to give retroactive effect in this case to our decision in Miller v. Alabama, 567 U.S. ---- (2012)?"
